newsitem.title: GERMANY: Spar purchase of Continent approved.
newsitem.headline: Spar purchase of Continent approved.

text.p: Spar AG said on Thursday German cartel authorities had approved its plan to take over 36 stores in the Continent-SB Warenhaeuser chain.
Spar plans to integrate the stores in its Interspar chain. It will invest about 60 million marks over the next four years in the stores, which it acquired from French retail group Promodes.
